text: William Laird was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:People from Larkhall Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Blantyre Celtic F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Gateshead F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of birth missing
title: William Laird (footballer)
